attributes.description:
Please visit our website for a virtual tour of this car as well as our online showroom. You can also click the Finance Option to do a remote finance application and get pre-approved on the vehicle of your choice.  
Great family car, reliable and robust. This vehicle is clean for its age and mechanically sound. Great Value for money with features that include; Clean interior, electric windows, alloy mags, air-con, ABS, Air bags, central locking and more! We take things a little more seriously at CBK Motors we do a full ABC Assessment on all vehicles. A: Body for dents, scratches and scuff marks. B: Overall Mechanical check over and C: Cosmetic and interior assessment for your buying pleasure! E&O
COME AND VIEW!
Finance Can be Arranged! 
Trade-ins Accepted!
Please contact our friendly and professional sales team for assistance!
Office: 010 449 3410 
Patrick: 068 521 2876
David : 067 131 6474
Zander: 065 830 9133

attributes.title: 2016 Ford Figo 1.5 Titanium 5-dr

attributes.description: Setting off the controls are intuitively placed as is typical of BMW design, and everything falls to hand. Shifts from the 6-speed manual gearbox are crisp and relatively short throw. Clutch take-up is friendly even to beginners and pedal resistance is light – a positive in heavy traffic. Weaving through traffic, the chassis begins to come to life. The car is nimble and easy to thread along congested roads. At first, the car feels larger than it really is thanks to your view over the hood, peering over the bulbous and muscular hood and fenders. After spending a few minutes in traffic however, it shrinks in size and perhaps feels more compact than its actual dimensions – a compliment to any car’s handling dynamics.
